ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Establishment of 6 Bedded Hospital with Sterilization ward at Pichatur, We need 2000 sterilization operations along with spacing methods, Mobile Medicare Unit for the Aged. We are running Mobile Medicare services for the 1500 Old age people in the door step delivery in 8 Revenue Mandals. we are running a mobile ICT in the remote entire Chittoor District to diagnose the HIV patients and take necessary actions for sending them to the ART Centers and Care supporting Centres. We also running two old age homes for the elderly disadvantaged persons by giving shelter, food,recreation ,referral health medicare services. Our organisation has struggled with the land grabbers with kind support of district and state level officials like minded people and issued leases deeds to 368 women landless beneficiaries. we eradicated the old traditional practice of mathamma system in which the young girls old scheduled sub caste were exploited by dedicating them to hindu goddess and they have been debarred from marriages,which has been eradicated by our organisation in 19 manuals of chittoor district.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: to establish aid and maintain educational cultural and other institutions to impart education at all stages for promotion of literature arts and science and all other subjects for the diffusion of useful knowledge in Andhra Pradesh to raise necessary funds to maintain educational institutions under its management and administer the same to grant aid to deserving students for promotion of studies to arrange extension lectures in one or more branches of knowledge to print and publish journals or magazines with articles contributing to the growth of knowledge human understanding and culture to do all such other things as may be conducive to the development or incidental to attain the above objects The strength of the Society is that it is not a religious or charitable or social or a family trust No individual had a controlling interest and the society did not bequeath large endowments that confer managing right or controlling interest on any group or individual It is purely an educational society to which numerous people organizations and individuals have donated only to contribute to the cause of education than for personal gain The enthusiasm spirit of service and the pursuit of objectives have been sustained for the last forty four years by a succession of promoters Power struggles to get hold of the society crises of management interference in the administration and dominance of individuals in the societys affairs were totally absent in its history General Body Meetings elections to the Executive Body are regularly conducted
